content: this is an easy square that is comprised of 16 popcorns - hence the name the cute name was conceived by catherine depasquale who is known as acrochetedworld person on ravelry she won the name a square contest stop by my ravelry group melinda miller designs 1 where we test patterns host cals and swaps and do all sorts of fun things 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/melinda-miller-designs
